comments:
Looks like it is caused by an InheritableEntryField. Possibly due to the change to non-drawn arrows for the inherit button on the Macintosh.

Here are the first few lines of the stack trace:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.rse.ui.widgets.InheritableEntryField.setToggleButtonHeight(InheritableEntryField.java:344)
	at org.eclipse.rse.ui.view.SystemInheritableTextCellEditor.createControl(SystemInheritableTextCellEditor.java:178)

	at org.eclipse.rse.ui.view.SystemTableView.computeLayout(SystemTableView.java:550)

Raising to P1. Since this causes the Details view to fail.

Fixed NPE caused by lack of GridData for non-drawn inherit button controls. Added GridData for the control - some hints may be ignored on non-drawn platforms.

Problem would have been evident not only on Macintosh but all non-Windows client platforms.

Verified.
